item.title: Fred Thompson To Announce September 6
item.description: I guess this makes it semi-official. Fred Thompson will announce his candidacy for President of the United States by WWW on September 6. Now, I’ve been blogging for Fred since there were only about a dozen and a half bloggers for Fred. All I’m saying is that, when he’s trying to fill his Cabinet . . . I expect his official entry to change the dynamics of the GOP race dramatically.
